font_family.headings: System Sans-Serif (Bold/Heavy) or Space Grotesk if available

layout_strategy.grid_system: Use Flexbox (flex-row, flex-col) for layouts. Avoid CSS Grid in React Native.

buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 rounded-full py-4 px-6 active:bg-zinc-700 items-center justify-center
buttons.outline: border border-zinc-700 rounded-full py-4 px-6 active:bg-zinc-900 items-center justify-center

cards.base: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800/50 rounded-2xl p-5 shadow-sm
cards.interactive: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800/50 rounded-2xl p-5 active:border-violet-500/50 transition-colors

badges.sell: bg-red-500/10 border border-red-500/20 px-3 py-1 rounded-full

icons.library: Lucide React Native (lucide-react-native) or Expo Vector Icons
icons.style: Stroke width 1.5 or 2, color matches text hierarchy

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: This is a REACT NATIVE EXPO project. Do NOT use HTML tags (div, span, img). Use <View>, <Text>, <Image>, <Pressable>, <ScrollView>.
Use 'nativewind' for styling (className='...'). Ensure tailwind.config.js is configured for content: ['./App.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}', './src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}'].
Do NOT use 'shadcn/ui' library directly as it is for web. BUILD 'Shadcn-like' components using standard React Native primitives with the styles defined in 'components' section above.
For Charts: Use 'react-native-chart-kit' or 'react-native-gifted-charts' (check package.json or install if needed).
For Navigation: Use 'expo-router' (file-based routing in /app directory).
For AI Analysis: Create a visually distinct 'AI Command Center' card with the 'glow' shadow and violet accents.
Ensure all text color is explicitly set (e.g., text-white, text-zinc-400) because default text color in RN is black.
Data-TestID: Add testID='...' prop to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Don't make generic centered layouts. Use padding and asymmetry.
Use dark colors independently, avoid muddy gradients.
Every interaction needs feedback (use Pressable style prop for opacity change).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
